attributes.action: stop pathetic attempts to smear anyone who dares to criticise the performance of the government and either get on with sorting out the myriad problems facing the country, or call a general election so that someone else can do the job instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the last couple of months, information was leaked pertaining to the alleged behind closed doors discussions about smearing General Richard Dannatt as soon as he retired. Despite the obvious pathetic nature of these plans, and their public exposure, the 'government' has today commenced its campaign. I call on Gordon Brown and his entire government to start acting like leaders not petulant schoolboys, and start focussing on Britain's problems. If not, then call an election so we the public can have our say on your performance.

rejection.details: Your petition must make a point about government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
